servinfo.title: Fuel Flow Actuator Removal and Installation

attention1.ptxt: Before servicing fuel system, be sure to observe Precautions on Fuel System Service .

item.ptxt: Do not reuse fuel flow actuator and fuel flow actuator bolt because it has the possibility that fuel leaks.
Never leave fuel flow actuator orifice open. Replace new fuel flow actuator at once in order to prevent fuel circuit from contamination.

s1.ptxt: Relief fuel pressure referring to Fuel Pressure Relief Procedure .
Clean fuel flow actuator and its surrounding area.
Remove fuel flow actuator (1) from injection pump by pulling and twisting it gradually.
Fit new fuel flow actuator (1) to injection pump.
Tighten new fuel flow actuator bolts (2) as follows.

s2.ptxt: Tighten fuel flow actuator bolts to 3 N·m (0.3 kgf-m, 2.5 lbf-ft).
Retighten fuel flow actuator bolts to 6 N·m (0.6 kgf-m, 4.5 lbf-ft).

torqueitem.t-note: Tighten 3 N·m (0.3 kgf-m, 2.5 lbf-ft) and 6 N·m (0.6 kgf-m, 4.5 lbf-ft) by the specified procedure.

s1.ptxt: Check fuel leakage referring to Fuel Leakage Check Procedure .
Check DTC referring to DTC Check .
